docs.text: Installing .NET 5 and ASP.NET 5 ¶ This page will instruct you how to download and install the .NET 5 SDK that includes ASP.NET 5 Web API. First, download the .NET SDK on your computer. Installing the SDK for .NET 5 ¶ Next install the .NET SDK on your computer. Next, open a terminal such as PowerShell , Command Prompt , or bash . Enter the following dotnet commands to verify that .NET 5 has been installed: dotnet --version You see the following output: 5.0.4 Congratulations! You're ready to create your first ASP.NET Web API. Next steps ¶ If you need some introduction to developing .NET applications, you can following the step-by-step tutorial or by watching .NET 101 videos on YouTube.
docs.title: Installing ASP.NET 5

docs.text: This page will instruct you how to download and install the .NET 5 SDK that includes ASP.NET 5 Web API. First, download the .NET SDK on your computer.
docs.title: Installing .NET 5 and ASP.NET 5

docs.text: Next install the .NET SDK on your computer. Next, open a terminal such as PowerShell , Command Prompt , or bash . Enter the following dotnet commands to verify that .NET 5 has been installed: dotnet --version You see the following output: 5.0.4 Congratulations! You're ready to create your first ASP.NET Web API.
docs.title: Installing the SDK for .NET 5

docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
